friday.title: Check-in & Coffee at the Caf√©
friday.description: Get your badge, grab a coffee, and meet your fellow makers.

friday.title: Keynote: "Art in the Age of Fabrication"
friday.description: A discussion on how modern tools are reshaping artistic expression.

saturday.title: Intro to Ham Radio & Electronics
saturday.description: Learn the basics of radio communication and how to get started with your own station.

saturday.title: Algorithmic Crochet
saturday.description: Explore the mathematical patterns and loops found in fiber arts. Yarn provided!

saturday.title: Wireless Energy Demo
saturday.description: Witness the power of Tesla coils and learn about the history of wireless energy on Long Island.

saturday.title: CircuitPython for Beginners
saturday.description: Start coding hardware with Python! We'll be making lights blink and sensors read data.

saturday.title: Indie Arcade Cabinet Design
saturday.description: A look into building custom controllers and cabinets for independent games.

saturday.title: Design for SLS Printing
saturday.description: Deep dive into Selective Laser Sintering and how to design complex geometries.

saturday.title: Art & Code Intersections
saturday.description: Creative coding techniques for creating immersive and interactive installations.

saturday.title: Combat Robot Teardown
saturday.description: See what goes inside a battle bot. We'll open up a 30lb bot and explain the mechanics.

saturday.title: RFID for Interactive Art
saturday.description: Using Radio Frequency Identification to track movement and trigger events in art pieces.

saturday.title: Bio-Art Basics
saturday.description: Integrating biology into artistic practice. Safe, hands-on experiments with microscopy.

saturday.title: Laser Cutting 101
saturday.description: From vector file to physical object. Learn the do's and don'ts of laser fabrication.

saturday.title: Soft Circuits & Wearables
saturday.description: Sewing electronics into fabric using conductive thread to create light-up apparel.

saturday.title: Late Night Maker Social
saturday.description: Relax, network, and enjoy some pizza with fellow creators.

sunday.title: Exhibition & Awards
sunday.description: Showcase your work to the public and win prizes in various categories.
